item.description:
This meetup will take place aboard the Tall Ship Formidable, which leaves from the Boston Waterboat Marina right behind the Chart House Restaurant on Long Wharf (http://www.tallshipfo... for details and directions). Note that the meeting will start at 5:30pm (when the ship leaves) and will cost $25 per person.

Please, please RSVP accurately so we have accurate count of attendees. We need a minimum to make this worthwhile and the ship can only hold a maximum of 40. Feel free to invite friends.
item.name: The Boston Sailing August Meetup
